# R package: `md.tools`

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Masked data tools.

## Installation

You can install the development version of `md.tools` from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```{r,eval=F}
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("queelius/md.tools")
```
